meanings.definition: A bag used for carrying items to and from work.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my lunch in my workbags.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new workbag to carry her laptop.
meanings.sent3: The workbags were so heavy, they felt like they were full of rocks!
meanings.sent4: Her workbags were like a trusty companion, always by her side.
meanings.sent5: The bright red workbags stood out in the sea of black briefcases.

meanings.definition: To fill or pack a bag with items for work.
meanings.sent1: I need to workbags my backpack with all my school supplies.
meanings.sent2: He workbags his suitcase with clothes for the trip.
meanings.sent3: She workbags her purse with snacks for the movie.
meanings.sent4: They workbags the moving boxes with care and precision.
meanings.sent5: The chef workbags the picnic basket with delicious treats for the outing.
